desc: HOTT founded in 1999, is a manufacture focused on digital audio & video products field. Our R&D team already have 20 years professional audio production experience. HOTT aims to provide portable, user-friendly and high-fidelity music player to our members. You can connect us if you meet any question about the products.

layout.text: Enjoy your favorite CDs while driving via FM Transmitter or AUX cable.
